name: Dasher (itch) (RayPlusPlus)
description:
Dash into enemies as they get faster over time and beat your High Score.

Controls:
  • Left click once to make a small dash
  • Hold left click to charge a longer dash
  • You are immune while dashing but can still be hit from behind
  • You can get hit while the Player sprite spinning
Attribution & big thanks:

Planet generator:

https://deep-fold.itch.io/pixel-planet-generator

Space background generator:

https://deep-fold.itch.io/space-background-generator

Player Sprite:

https://www.kenney.nl/assets/simple-space

Font used:

https://www.dafont.com/it/joystix.font

Explosion Asset:

https://nyknck.itch.io/explosion

Description:

Dasher is a simple endless top down point based game, inspired by retro arcade games with their classic 2D pixel look, score and high score, just started getting around Unity about a month ago and was able to complete this project in about a week and a half, with this just being my first game, I want to create many more going forward.

I hope you enjoy dashing through enemies as much as I enjoyed making them :)
